item.title: CS13-lecture-notes
item.description: CS 13 Lecture Notes # Jan 28, 2019 # Download BlueJ [2019-01-29] Weather class # public class Weather { private double highTemp; private double lowTemp; private String condition; private int rainChain; public Weather (double h, double l, String c, int r) { highTemp = h; lowTemp = l; condition = c; rainChain = r; } public double delta() { return highTemp - lowTemp; } public String toString() { return "High: " + highTemp + ", Low: " + lowTemp + ", Condition: " + condition + ", Chance of rain: " + rainChance; } } Using this class we can make another to populate a forecast
